title: 多款Samsung Galaxy设备中间人攻击漏洞
description:
Samsung Galaxy S4等都是韩国三星（Samsung）公司发布的智能移动设备。

多款Samsung Galaxy设备的SwiftKey language-pack升级实现过程存在安全漏洞。由于程序使用HTTP连接skslm.swiftkey.net服务器。攻击者可通过修改HTTP响应利用该漏洞实施中间人攻击，写入language-pack文件。
solution:
目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载：

title: libpng 'png_set_text_2()'函数内存破坏漏洞
description: libpng是一款多种应用程序所使用的解析PNG图形格式的函数库。当处理某些文本块时 "png_set_text_2()"函数(pngset.c)存在错误，攻击者可以构建恶意PNG文件，诱使用户解析，触发堆内存破坏。成功利用漏洞可以以应用程序上下文执行任意代码。
solution: libpng 1.5.10、1.4.11、1.2.49、1.0.59已经修复此漏洞，建议用户下载使用：http://www.libpng.org/pub/png/libpng.html

title: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS加密问题漏洞

solution:

title: Spring Security 'RunAsManager'本地特权提升漏洞
description: Spring Security的前身是Acegi Security ，是Spring项目组中用来提供安全认证服务的框架Spring Security提供一个机制(RunAsManager)允许在与预定义用户不同的特权集执行特殊操作。这个机制存在一个竞争条件错误，允许提升特权。如RunAsManager为当前调用返回一个验证对象，安全解析器会临时以当前调用的安全上下文存储这个对象，而这个验证对象可与其他当前同时执行的线程共享，在这些线程中可导致特权提升。
solution: 用户可参考如下供应商提供的安全公告获得补丁信息：http://www.springsource.com/security/cve-2011-2731

title: 多款Qualcomm产品缓冲区错误漏洞
description:

多款Qualcomm产品中存在缓冲区错误漏洞。该漏洞源于网络系统或产品在内存上执行操作时，未正确验证数据边界，导致向关联的其他内存位置上执行了错误的读写操作。攻击者可利用该漏洞导致缓冲区溢出或堆溢出等。以下产品及版本受到影响：Qualcomm MDM9206；MDM9607；MSM8909W；MSM8996AU；QCA6574AU；QCS405；QCS605；Qualcomm 215；SD 210；SD 212；SD 205；SD 425；SD 427；SD 430；SD 435；SD 439；SD 429；SD 450；SD 600；SD 615/16；SD 415；SD 625；SD 632；SD 636；SD 665；SD 675；SD 712；SD 710；SD 670；SD 730；SD 820；SD 820A；SD 835；SD 845；SD 850；SD 855；SDA660；SDM439；SDM630；SDM660；SDX20。
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: google tensorflow 跨界内存读
description: TensorFlow is an end-to-end open source platform for machine learning. In affected versions an attacker can cause undefined behavior via binding a reference to null pointer in all binary cwise operations that don't require broadcasting (e.g., gradients of binary cwise operations). The [implementation](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/84d053187cb80d975ef2b9684d4b61981bca0c41/tensorflow/core/kernels/cwise_ops_common.h#L264) assumes that the two inputs have exactly the same number of elements but does not check that. Hence, when the eigen functor executes it triggers heap OOB reads and undefined behavior due to binding to nullptr. We have patched the issue in GitHub commit 93f428fd1768df147171ed674fee1fc5ab8309ec. The fix will be included in TensorFlow 2.6.0. We will also cherrypick this commit on TensorFlow 2.5.1, TensorFlow 2.4.3, and TensorFlow 2.3.4, as these are also affected and still in supported range.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: suse yast2-security 使用已被攻破或存在风险的密码学算法
description: yast2-security didn't use secure defaults to protect passwords. This became a problem on 2019-10-07 when configuration files that set secure settings were moved to a different location. As of the 20191022 snapshot the insecure default settings were used until yast2-security switched to stronger defaults in 4.2.6 and used the new configuration file locations. Password created during this time used DES password encryption and are not properly protected against attackers that are able to access the password hashes.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: Oracle Fujitsu M10-1 cURL 信息泄漏漏洞
description: libcurl 7.1 through 7.57.0 可能会意外地向第三方泄漏身份验证数据。当请求在其HTTP请求中发送自定义标头时，libcurl将首先在初始URL中将这组标头发送到主机，但如果被要求遵循重定向并返回30 X HTTP响应代码，则发送到“Location：`ResponseHeader值”中URL中提到的主机。对于传递自定义的“授权：”标头的应用程序来说，向后续主机发送相同的标头特别是一个问题，因为这个标头通常包含对隐私敏感的信息或数据，这些信息或数据允许其他人使用客户端的请求模拟libcurl。
solution:
目前厂商已经发布了升级补丁以修复这个安全问题，请到厂商的主页下载:
https://curl.haxx.se/docs/adv_2018-b3bf.html

title: D-Link DIR-878 命令注入漏洞
description: 在固件为1.12A1的D-Link DIR-878设备上发现问题。此问题是一种命令注入，允许远程攻击者执行任意代码并获取根shell。命令注入漏洞允许攻击者通过特制的/HNAP1 POST请求执行任意操作系统命令。当任何HNAP API函数使用来自SetStaticRouteIPv6Settings API函数的请求体的不可信输入触发对系统函数的调用时，就会发生这种情况，如DestNetwork字段中的shell元字符所示。
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

cwe.cwe_description: OS命令中使用的特殊元素转义处理不恰当（OS命令注入）

title: Magic Stamp for Android信息泄露漏洞
description:
Magic Stamp（也称vn.avagame.apotatem）application for Android是一套基于Android平台的应用程序。

Magic Stamp应用程序2.8版本中存在安全漏洞，该漏洞由于程序未能正确验证SSL服务器端的X.509证书。攻击者可通过特制的证书利用该漏洞实施中间人攻击，伪造数据欺骗服务器，获取敏感信息。
solution:
目前厂商暂未发布修复措施解决此安全问题，建议使用此软件的用户随时关注厂商主页或参考网址以获取解决办法：
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t5GXwjw82SyunALVJb2w0zi3FoLRIkfGPc7AMjRF0r4/edit?usp=sharing

IBM Security Guardium Big Data Intelligence (SonarG)存在关键资源权限分配不正确漏洞。非预期角色可利用该漏洞越权读取或修改安全关键型资源。

GuixSD Git commit 5e66574a128937e7f2fcf146d146225703ccfd5d之前的版本中存在安全漏洞，该漏洞源于程序未能正确的使用POSIX硬链接。攻击者可利用该漏洞在/gnu/store中创建setuid可执行性文件。

title: Windows 文本服务框架特权提升漏洞
description:
当 TSF 服务器进程未验证其接收的输入源或命令时，Windows 文本服务框架 (TSF) 中存在特权提升漏洞。成功利用此漏洞的攻击者可以插入命令或读取通过恶意输入法编辑器 (IME) 发送的输入。此漏洞仅影响安装了 IME 的系统。
若要利用此漏洞，攻击者首先必须登录系统。然后，攻击者可以运行一个为利用此漏洞而经特殊设计的应用程序，从而控制受影响的系统。
此安全更新通过更正 TSF 服务器和客户端相互验证输入的方式来修复此漏洞。
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: Java - Statement.invoke() Trusted Method Chain Exploit (Metasploit)
description: Oracle JavaSE和Javafor Business6Update18、5.0Update23和1.4.2_25中Java运行时环境组件中的未指定漏洞允许远程攻击者通过未知向量影响机密性、完整性和可用性。注：先前的信息是从2010年3月的CPU中获得的。甲骨文没有评论一位可靠的研究人员的说法，即这与在Java运行时环境（JRE）中执行特权方法时的不当检查有关。该环境允许攻击者通过（1）一个不受信任的对象来执行任意代码，该对象扩展受信任的类，但没有修改某个方法，或者（2）“与接口类似的信任问题”，也就是“被信任的方法链接远程代码执行漏洞”。
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: Linux Kernel 'agp_ioctl()'本地特权提升漏洞
description: Linux是一款开源的操作系统。pg_start拷贝自agp_ioctl()的AGPIOC_BIND和AGPIOC_UNBIND ioctl cmds，从用户空间传递给agpioc_bind_wrap()，根据评注中描述，在AGPIOC_BIND情况下(pg_start + mem->page_count)会进行wrap()处理，而在AGPIOC_UNBIND的情况下根本没有进行任何检查，结果可导致非特权用户(一般是"video"组)对系统进行拒绝服务或特权提升攻击。
solution: 用户可参考如下供应商提供的安全公告获得补丁信息：https://lkml.org/lkml/2011/4/14/293

title: cisco content_security_management_appliance 输入验证不恰当
description: A vulnerability in the email message filtering feature of Cisco AsyncOS Software for Cisco Email Security Appliance (ESA) and Cisco Content Security Management Appliance (SMA) could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker to cause repeated crashes in some internal processes that are running on the affected devices, resulting in a denial of service (DoS) condition. The vulnerability is due to insufficient input validation of email attachments. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending an email message with a crafted attachment through an affected device. A successful exploit could allow the attacker to cause specific processes to crash repeatedly, resulting in the complete unavailability of both the Cisco Advanced Malware Protection (AMP) and message tracking features and in severe performance degradation while processing email. After the affected processes restart, the software resumes filtering for the same attachment, causing the affected processes to crash and restart again. A successful exploit could also allow the attacker to cause a repeated DoS condition. Manual intervention may be required to recover from this situation.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: xen xen 授权机制不正确
description: arm: guest_physmap_remove_page not removing the p2m mappings The functions to remove one or more entries from a guest p2m pagetable on Arm (p2m_remove_mapping, guest_physmap_remove_page, and p2m_set_entry with mfn set to INVALID_MFN) do not actually clear the pagetable entry if the entry doesn't have the valid bit set. It is possible to have a valid pagetable entry without the valid bit set when a guest operating system uses set/way cache maintenance instructions. For instance, a guest issuing a set/way cache maintenance instruction, then calling the XENMEM_decrease_reservation hypercall to give back memory pages to Xen, might be able to retain access to those pages even after Xen started reusing them for other purposes.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。

title: google tensorflow 跨界内存读
description: TensorFlow is an open source platform for machine learning. The `GatherNd` function takes arguments that determine the sizes of inputs and outputs. If the inputs given are greater than or equal to the sizes of the outputs, an out-of-bounds memory read or a crash is triggered. This issue has been patched in GitHub commit 4142e47e9e31db481781b955ed3ff807a781b494. The fix will be included in TensorFlow 2.10.0. We will also cherrypick this commit on TensorFlow 2.9.1, TensorFlow 2.8.1, and TensorFlow 2.7.2, as these are also affected and still in supported range. There are no known workarounds for this issue.

title: Stack-based Buffer Overflow
description: XStream serializes Java objects to XML and back again. Versions prior to 1.4.20 may allow a remote attacker to terminate the application with a stack overflow error, resulting in a denial of service only via manipulation the processed input stream. The attack uses the hash code implementation for collections and maps to force recursive hash calculation causing a stack overflow. This issue is patched in version 1.4.20 which handles the stack overflow and raises an InputManipulationException instead. A potential workaround for users who only use HashMap or HashSet and whose XML refers these only as default map or set, is to change the default implementation of java.util.Map and java.util per the code example in the referenced advisory. However, this implies that your application does not care about the implementation of the map and all elements are comparable.
solution: 建议您更新当前系统或软件至最新版，完成漏洞的修复。
